title: Progressive (PGR) Trading Near $30.91 Resistance Level
content:
Option-trade picking algorithms patented by MarketIntelligenceCenter.com found a trading opportunity with Progressive Corp (PGR) that should provide a 3.52% return in just 156 days.

Sell one Feb. '16 call at the $30.00 level for each 100 shares of Progressive for a net debit per share of $28.98. That net debit also serves as the breakeven point for this trade, giving it 5.23% downside protection.

PGR has found support around $30.01 lately with resistance near the $30.91 level. PGR closed Tuesday at $30.58 after trading between $30.18 and $30.63. In the past year, the stock has hit a 52-week low of $24.16 and 52-week high of $31.57.
